short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add time tracking to TargetProcess 3 with Harvest.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to start a timer from within a TargetProcess entity. Brings up the standard overlay and allows you to select the project, task and write your own description if desired. The extension will use the title of the entity to auto populate the description and based on the project name associated with the entity, it will try to match the project. This also allows for deep linking in the time tracked to link directly back to the entity from Harvest.
